function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Using an experimental nature of tools to understand COVID-19 transmission requirements","Impact":"Inaccurate or unreliable findings that may lead to ineffective mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Utilize a combination of traditional and innovative research methods for more robust results","Technologies":"Advanced data analysis tools, AI-powered survey analysis","People":"Researchers, public health officials, building occupants","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Primary data collection through survey tools with close-ended questions","Impact":"Limited understanding of complex COVID-19 transmission dynamics","Mitigation":"Incorporate open-ended questions to capture nuanced information, supplement with qualitative data collection methods","Technologies":"Survey platforms with both open-ended and close-ended question support","People":"Survey respondents, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, survey platform providers"},{"Description":"Comparative analysis on sustainability and hygiene issues at international levels","Impact":"Potential oversight of specific local factors affecting COVID-19 transmission in the built environment","Mitigation":"Combine international analysis with local data and expert input to ensure comprehensive understanding","Technologies":"Data aggregation and analysis tools, expert recommendation systems","People":"Researchers, public health authorities, local community members","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
